description: Camagru was the first ever web project I worked on, it was a school project while I was studying at 42 Paris, I realised this "instagram like" website by myself using PHP, Javascript and MySql. If features a screen to take a selfie with a few filters, an user page where you can see all the photos you've published and can choose to share them or keep them private, a feed page where you can see other users photos, like them and leave a comment. Finaly you can choose to receive email notifications when one of you photo receive a new like or comment.
